ls: Lists directory contents in long format
ll: Lists directory contents in human-readable format
gs: Shows the status of a Git repository
ga: Adds all files to the staging area
gca: Amends the last commit without editing
gp: Pulls from the remote Git repository
gpu: Pushes to the remote Git repository
gcb: Creates and switches to a new Git branch
glog: Shows Git log with a graphical representation
gstash: Stashes the current changes in Git
gpop: Applies the most recent stash in Git
pipfreeze: Exports the installed Python packages to a requirements.txt file
help: Lists available commands and their descriptions
